Class WikiModel

All Implemented Interfaces:
info.bliki.wiki.model.IConfiguration, info.bliki.wiki.model.IWikiModel
public class WikiModel
extends info.bliki.wiki.model.WikiModel

Extension of WikiModel to allow for custom pieces, such as the baseURL for the TableOfContents tag

Author:
mark, luis
